workspace.title: PowerBI workspace
workspace.description: Please leave this blank or set it to Default Workspace if you want to refresh a dataset that is not assigned to a workspace.

dataset_list.title: PowerBI datasets
dataset_list.description: Use this field to fetch available datasets accessible with your credentials.

wait.title: Wait for refresh jobs to finish
wait.description: Poll the dataset refresh status and wait until it is finished. If set to No, the component execution ends as soon as the refresh jobs are triggered.

alldatasets.title: Wait for all datasets to finish
alldatasets.description: End job with error if any dataset finishes with a failed status.

interval.title: Refresh job status polling interval(s)
interval.description: Check the refresh status at the specified interval (in seconds).

timeout.title: Refresh job status polling timeout
timeout.description: Poll the statuses of triggered jobs for the specified number of seconds. The component ends after reaching the timeout value. The maximum timeout is 2 hours.
